title: Kill me
sinopse: Akatsuki and Sagami have lived happily together with a nun and other orphans for 17 years. That happiness is shattered when it's learned that Sagami is a prince! With only a rosary that Sagami gave him as proof of his feelings, Akatsuki goes off to find him, only to find himself serving as a prostitute for the renowned Touchup Summer House! Will Akatsuki be able to see Sagami's face again? Or will he find himself losing his heart to someone else?
